actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Science and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

Referred to House Science and Technology
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

Subcommittee on Environment and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To provide for a study of measures to achieve energy independence for the United States without adversely affecting the environment.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Energy to enter into an arrangement with the National Academy of Sciences for a study of what measures the United States can take, including what research needs to be undertaken, in order to achieve energy independence without adversely affecting the environment.Requires a report to Congress on the results of the study.

titles.title: To provide for a study of measures to achieve energy independence for the United States without adversely affecting the environment.
